## üîç What‚Äôs Mission Agent Possible?

It‚Äôs a contest designed for developers who love building intelligent solutions. Your mission:

- **Create an AI Agent**
- **Solve a simulated crisis**

And yes‚Äîthere are prizes!

- **Top prizes** like an **Xbox** and **hundreds of dollars in Microsoft Store credit** are reserved for in-person attendees.

## üß† How Do You Choose the Right AI Model?

Model selection is critical for building an effective agent. To help you succeed, check out our [**Model Selection Adventure**](https://aka.ms/models-blog) blog:

- Learn how to **identify the right problem**

This guide will give your agent the competitive edge it needs.

## Are you ready to take on a challenge that blends creativity, problem-solving, and AI innovation? Whether you‚Äôre attending Microsoft Ignite 2025 in person or joining the excitement from anywhere in the world, this is your moment.

## üîç What‚Äôs Mission Agent Possible?

It‚Äôs a contest designed for developers who love building intelligent solutions. Your mission:

- **Create an AI Agent**
- **Solve a simulated crisis**
- **Showcase your skills to the world**

And yes‚Äîthere are prizes!

- **Top prizes** like an **Xbox** and **hundreds of dollars in Microsoft Store credit** are reserved for in-person attendees.
- **Global participants** can still win recognition and a chance to be featured on the **[Model Mondays](https://aka.ms/model-mondays) podcast**.

üëâ **Contest details:** [https://aka.ms/ignite25/mission-agent](https://aka.ms/ignite25/mission-agent)

## üß† How Do You Choose the Right AI Model?

Model selection is critical for building an effective agent. To help you succeed, check out our [**Model Selection Adventure**](https://aka.ms/models-blog) blog:

- Learn how to **identify the right problem**
- Explore **model strengths and trade-offs**
- Test outputs using **GitHub Models Playground**

This guide will give your agent the competitive edge it needs.

üìñ **Read more:** [https://aka.ms/models-blog](https://aka.ms/models-blog)

### ‚úÖ Why Join?

- Showcase your skills to a global audience
- Learn hands-on techniques for AI agent development
- Win prizes and earn recognition
